description: Detects the creation of files that look like exports of the local SAM (Security Account Manager)
name: SAM Dump File Creation
query: (file.path:(*\\Temp\\sam OR *\\sam.sav OR *\\Intel\\sam OR *\\sam.hive OR *\\Perflogs\\sam OR *\\ProgramData\\sam OR *\\Users\\Public\\sam OR *\\AppData\\Local\\sam OR *\\AppData\\Roaming\\sam OR *_ShadowSteal.zip OR *\\Documents\\SAM.export) OR file.path:"c\:\\sam" OR file.path:(*\\hive_sam_* OR *\\sam.save* OR *\\sam.export* OR *\\\~reg_sam.save* OR *\\sam_backup* OR *\\sam.bck* OR *\\sam.backup*))
author: Florian Roth
